title: Linux: SSH and Key-Based Authentication
author: Damon M Garn
description: Learning to leverage SSH is an essential Linux sysadmin skill. This article covers basic SSH configurations, password-based authentication, and general security settings.
cntitle: Linux：SSH 和基于密钥的身份验证
cndescription: 学习使用 SSH 是 Linux 系统管理员必备技能。本文涵盖基本的 SSH 配置、基于密码的身份验证以及一般安全设置。
